title: Intermodal equipment receipts (EIR)
dataVerified: Carrier, container/chassis number, equipment condition, damage notation
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Equipment status (issued/returned). Link to terminal operator/carrier system (carriers and terminals, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents altered equipment damage notation (equipment interchange fraud). Domain binding verifies terminal operator/carrier. Damage responsibility documentation. Prevents fraudulent damage claims.
